title: STAT+: Child’s sudden death unnerves a promising area of gene therapy research
description: Researchers hoped they had finally found a way to get gene therapies past the blood-brain barrier. Then the first patient died.
content: Researchers hoped they had finally found a way to get gene therapies past the blood-brain barrier. Then the first patient died.
